name: Race to Harvest
description:
Leave Your Feedback

After playing, please fill out the post play-test survey to let me know what you thought of the game and to help guide further development of the game.

Link to the Feedback Form How To Play

Click the shop icon (bottom left) to open the seed market where you can purchase new seeds to plant. After selecting a seed type, you can purchase the seed if you have enough credits (shown in the top left) by clicking the "purchase" button. You can close the shop menu at any time by clicking the X in the top left corner.

Note: Some plants can only be placed in certain areas and may effect the plants around them. See the seed description in the seed market for more info.

Controls
  • Left Mouse: Deselect current plant
  • Right Mouse: Plant and harvest crops, interact with menus
Future Features and Mechanics

Below are a list of possible mechanics and additions I will implement in the future. Not all mechanics listed will be added, but they are mechanics I think would create a more in-depth experience.

  • Purchasable tools and structures (watering tank/sprinklers, scarecrow, etc)
  • Randomly generated natural events such as flooding, droughts, and tornadoes.
  • Fishing?
  • A dynamic market with changing sale and purchase prices based on crop demands.
  • More in-depth farming mechanics, such as soil fertility, plant moisture preference, and soil aeration.
  • Skill upgrades to increase efficiency in particular farming areas.
  • Various seasonal events.
  • Plant crossbreeding.
  • Level editor, floating islands, and a story mode.
  • And much more!

Here is a *very* quick sketch of some possible future visuals. Enjoy!
